GSD.product_version: versions from v3.7 to before v4.9.318
GSD.description:
tcp: tcp_rtx_synack() can be called from process context

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.9.318 by commit 3db889f883e65bbd3b1401279bfc1e9ed255c481, it was introduced in version v3.7 by commit 168a8f58059a22feb9e9a2dcc1b8053dbbbc12ef. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: tcp: tcp_rtx_synack() can be called from process context
